mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT DISTINCT I.INAME,T.SCATEGORY,I.AMOUNT,I.VOS,I.MFG,C.CN_NAME,T.TYPE, N.CNT FROM ITEM I JOIN ITEM_TYPE T ON (I.TYPE_NO = T.TYPE_NO) JOIN CONN C ON (C.CN_CODE = I.CN_CODE) JOIN STRG_AREA A ON (A.AREA_NO = I.AREA_NO) JOIN STRG S ON (A.STRG_NO = S.STRG_NO) JOIN (SELECT INAME, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM ITEM GROUP BY INAME) N ON (I.INAME = N.INAME))

SELECT DISTINCT I.INAME,T.SCATEGORY,I.AMOUNT,I.VOS,I.MFG,C.CN_NAME,T.TYPE, N.CNT FROM ITEM I JOIN ITEM_TYPE T ON (I.TYPE_NO = T.TYPE_NO) JOIN CONN C ON (C.CN_CODE = I.CN_CODE) JOIN STRG_AREA A ON (A.AREA_NO = I.AREA_NO) JOIN STRG S ON (A.STRG_NO = S.STRG_NO) JOIN (SELECT INAME, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM ITEM GROUP BY INAME) N ON (I.INAME = N.INAME)

SELECT T.LCATEGORY,T.MCATEGORY,T.SCATEGORY,I.INO,I.VOS,I.VAT,I.UP,I.MFG,C.CN_NAME,S.STRG_NAME,A.AREA_NAME FROM STRG_AREA A JOIN STRG S ON (S.STRG_NO=A.STRG_NO) JOIN ITEM I ON (I.AREA_NO=A.AREA_NO) JOIN ITEM_TYPE T ON (I.TYPE_NO=T.TYPE_NO) JOIN CONN C ON (C.CN_CODE = I.CN_CODE) WHERE I.INAME=#{iname}
SELECT RPT_NO,RPT_TITLE,RPT_STATUS FROM REP_REQ R JOIN REPORT USING(RPT_NO)
